mapper.select: select revenue.revenuenum, aa.* from ( select sum(outcome) outcome, sum(ticketincome) ticketincome, sum(storeincome) storeincome, to_char(revenuedate,'yyyy-mm') revenuedate from revenue r,branch b where r.branchnum=b.branchnum and b.brname='도봉' group by to_char(revenuedate,'yyyy-mm') ORDER BY revenuedate )aa, revenue
